metadata.title: CVE-2025-0247 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Memory safety bugs present in Firefox 133 and Thunderbird 133. Some ofthese bugs showed evidence of memory corruption and we presume that withenough effort some of these could have been exploited to run arbitrarycode. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 134.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
